statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date FROM supplier_contracts WHERE contract_end_date >= '2022-10-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contract_end_date, alert_days_before_expiry FROM supplier_contracts ORDER BY alert_days_before_expiry ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT contract_id, supplier_name, contract_start_date, DATE_ADD(contract_end_date, INTERVAL alert_days_before_expiry DAY) AS expiry_with_alert_date FROM supplier_contracts;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_name, contract_end_date FROM supplier_contracts WHERE contract_end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts WHERE alert_days_before_expiry > 30 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, contract_end_date;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS contract_count FROM supplier_contracts GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING contract_count > 1 ORDER BY contract_count DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, MIN(contract_start_date) AS earliest_contract_start_date, MAX(contract_end_date) AS latest_contract_end_date FROM supplier_contracts GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date FROM supplier_contracts ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC
SELECT alert_message, alert_date FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date
SELECT contract_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_contracts WHERE contract_end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Inc%'
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, contract_start_date ASC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_name, contract_end_date FROM supplier_contracts WHERE contract_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS contracts_count FROM supplier_contracts GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT s.supplier_name, a.alert_message, a.alert_date FROM supplier_contracts s JOIN alerts a ON s.contract_id = a.contract_id ORDER BY a.alert_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, DATEDIFF(contract_end_date, contract_start_date) AS contract_duration_days FROM supplier_contracts WHERE YEAR(contract_start_date) < 2022 ORDER BY contract_duration_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_end_date FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE contract_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Contracts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Contracts.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM RenewalAlerts WHERE alert_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY supplier_id ASC, alert_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM Suppliers WHERE contract_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Contracts WHERE notification_sent = TRUE
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM Suppliers ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers JOIN Contracts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Contracts.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts;
SELECT supplier_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM supplier_contracts WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM procurement_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT contract_id, renewal_date FROM contract_renewals WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contracts WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM supplier_contracts WHERE contract_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM procurement_teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%Procurement%';
SELECT alert_message, alert_date FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS contract_count FROM supplier_contracts GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date FROM suppliers WHERE contract_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, contract_value FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_type, contract_status FROM suppliers s JOIN contracts c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id WHERE c.contract_status = 'Active';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(contract_id) AS num_contracts FROM procurement_teams pt JOIN contracts c ON pt.team_id = c.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_type, contract_value FROM suppliers s JOIN contracts c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id;
SELECT team_name, contract_type, contract_value FROM procurement_teams t JOIN contracts c ON t.team_id = c.team_id;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(contract_value) AS total_contract_value FROM contracts GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY total_contract_value DESC;
